name: claude-view
description: Browse and export Claude Code sessions as beautiful HTML

scripts.dev: concurrently -n rust,vite -c red,cyan "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:client:wait"
scripts.dev:client:wait: bunx wait-on http://localhost:47892/api/health && bun run dev:client
scripts.preview: bun run build && cargo run -p vibe-recall-server --release
scripts.check: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun run test
scripts.dist:pack: mkdir -p /tmp/claude-view-staging && cp target/release/vibe-recall /tmp/claude-view-staging/ && cp -r dist /tmp/claude-view-staging/ && tar -czf /tmp/claude-view-darwin-arm64.tar.gz -C /tmp/claude-view-staging . && echo 'Packed: /tmp/claude-view-darwin-arm64.tar.gz'
scripts.dist:install: rm -rf ~/.cache/claude-view && mkdir -p ~/.cache/claude-view/bin && tar -xzf /tmp/claude-view-darwin-arm64.tar.gz -C ~/.cache/claude-view/bin && echo '0.1.0' > ~/.cache/claude-view/version && echo 'Installed to ~/.cache/claude-view/'
scripts.dist:test: bun run build && cargo build --release -p vibe-recall-server && bun run dist:pack && bun run dist:install && bun run dist:run
scripts.release:bump: node -e "const v=process.argv[1]; const fs=require('fs'); const p=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('npx-cli/package.json','utf8')); p.version=v; fs.writeFileSync('npx-cli/package.json', JSON.stringify(p,null,2)+'\n'); console.log('npx-cli/package.json -> '+v);"
